title: [Ta'Illistim, Sylvar Pointe]
description: Surrounding the wrought iron gate, a tall arbor covered with twining lavender roses cascading in shimmering falls of color frames a pea-gravel covered trail.  An intricately carved stone bench rests beneath a nearby tree.

Surrounding the wrought iron gate, a tall arbor covered with twining lavender roses cascading in shimmering falls of color frames a pea-gravel covered trail.  An intricately carved stone bench rests beneath a nearby tree.  A glaesine lantern hanging from a nearby post provides dim illumination.

Surrounding the wrought iron gate, silver trellises covered with twining white roses frame a pea-gravel covered trail.  An intricately carved stone bench rests beneath a nearby tree, the lantern in its branches providing a wan blue illumination.
Surrounding the wrought iron gate, silver trellises covered with twining white roses frame a pea-gravel covered trail.  An intricately carved stone bench rests beneath a nearby tree.
